Dear All,

 

Your ADGM trade licence is due to expire on 25 September 2025.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your ADGM trade licence under the terms of your Lease.

Your ADGM trade licence is due to expire on 25 September 2025.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your ADGM trade licence under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards,

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri
